alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Jones; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 1:36PM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 18 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch or less. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Stanley, Hughes, Jones and Lyman Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
